alert.note: Alert for Ford; Grundy; Livingston; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 3:35PM CST until March 03 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wet snow expected, occasionally heavy with thundersnow. Total snow accumulations of up to one to three inches with locally higher amounts south of I-80. Winds gusting as high as 45 to 55 mph, highest south of the Kankakee River. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central and northeast Illinois. * WHEN...Until 10 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Expect slush on area roadways during the evening commute. Strong winds south of the Kankakee River could further reduce visibility in falling snow down to one half mile or less at times and bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

area.areaDesc: Ford; Grundy; Livingston; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will
